text:
一览表
对于本次评估，您将创建一个由三个任务组成的组合，这些任务与三个模块目标相联系：设计，
分析和报告；专业技能；研究技能。
投资组合占该模块总分数的100%。 本模块的加权为您的20个学分
马。 您将收到与评估标准相关的整个投资组合的总分。
内容和格式
PAS1分为三个区块，投资组合评估分为三个与之一致的任务。
任务一（专业技能）：研究员陈述（500字）
任务二（研究技能）：文献综述（2000字）
任务三（设计、分析和报告）：研究意义（500字）
trans:
Overview
For this assessment, you will create a portfolio comprising three tasks, each aligned with the objectives of the three module components: Design,
Analysis, and Reporting; Professional Skills; and Research Skills.
The portfolio accounts for 100% of the module’s total score. This module carries a weighting equivalent to your 20 credits
You will receive a single overall score for the entire portfolio, based on the assessment criteria.
Content and Format
PAS1 is divided into three sections, with the portfolio assessment reflecting three corresponding tasks.
Task 1 (Professional Skills): Researcher Statement (500 words)
Task 2 (Research Skills): Literature Review (2,000 words)
Task 3 (Design, Analysis, and Reporting): Research Rationale (500 words)
